articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola has lashed out at the character of his players - at the same time that one of his former stars, Oleksandr Zinchenko, has been driving Arsenal's title bid
articles.content:
It feels somewhat ludicrous to even entertain the notion that Pep Guardiola and Manchester City are currently engulfed in a crisis.
After all, they've just taken six points from Tottenham and Wolves… [+4804 chars]
